reviewText: I am planning a trip to Sardinia in 30 days and I wanted to see what this island looked like. I bought the DVD, Mediterranean Escape: Sardinia, thinking it would show me and describe to me what the island looked like, what several of the towns looked like, the must see places, etc., but instead it was an hour of nothing but video showing the waves coming in and going back out on maybe three different beaches. It made me sea-sick.

I happened to run across this DVD while browsing on the web. I found it to be a convenient way to escape the stress of my everyday life, especially in the winter. Has none of that crappy New Age music, just the real sounds of the ocean. A great way to lie on the couch read a book or just zone out and stare at the beach scenes on the TV. Looks good on a TV. I feel like I'm on some expensive European vacation.  This is the company's best DVD, unless you prefer a tropical setting.  Then go for Tropical Timeout.
